module: Module-level comment: The 'qmult' module executes fixed-point multiplication, handling inputs (`i_multiplicand`, `i_multiplier`) and outputting `o_result`, all of N-bit width. It calculates the product excluding their sign bits and adjusts the result based on parameter Q. Two internal registers (`r_result` and `r_RetVal`) hold intermediate full products and the final adjusted result, considering the XOR of input sign bits for output sign determination.
